entry.title: Cash Flow Reference Report Issue
entry.content:
Hi Everyone, 

Users facing issue that system currency are not showing in latest cash flow reference report. it was showing in september but missing in October. can someone please assist to explain or suggest a solution?

September below is showing for this JE

October it is empty despite us trying various methods

Please help on this 

Thank you

entry.title: Import Fixed Assets: Choose series of Item Number
entry.content:
Hello folks.

I'm importing fixed asset data and wish to choose a series for the item number.  I've prepared some series but the importing chooses the "manual" automatically.  How can I specify the series like ALM in the picture below?

Thank you for your support in advance.

entry.title: Import Fixed Assets: What value APC should take?
entry.content:
Hello folks,

I put original cost in APC when I imported a fixed asset item.  But it doesn't seem right.  In the case below, The original price was 109,055 MXN and the remaining life is 32 months out of 120 months.  NBV only reflects the depreciation of this year.  Should I put 290,813.33 MXN that is 32/120 as the APC?

Thank you for your support in advance.

entry.title: AD Users are not bound with Users
entry.content:
We have cloud environment deployed with Cloud Control Center for SAP Business One.

Currently on version: PL21

After upgrading to PL21 the single signon is not working.

I noticed under User Management, Mapped AD User field is blank.

 

All the SLD agents are online, also this worse Woking in PL20.

Additionally we cant use DTW, after login it shows error "There is no company database in the server."

entry.title: Negative cost amount in Landed Cost in SAP B1
entry.content:
My customer is using SAP Business one 10  HANA  (FP2508).

For business reason, they have requirement to input negative amount in Landed cost, so decrease the amount of the imported materials. 

I tried but failed and got the message that In "Actual Customs" field, enter amount equal to or greater than 0 .     In Google and ChatGPT,  show that negative amount input is Ok. 

Is there any setup steps to enable this negative amount input in Landed cost?  or  It is not allowed in SAP B1 ?

entry.title: Invalid UOM Group after upload Item through DTW
entry.content:
Dear Team,

After uploading items through DTW, the items are getting uploaded successfully but showing an invalid UOM group. Please note that the group is set as the default and updated as manual, and it reflects correctly in that case. There is only one UOM group in the system.

Please guide on the same.

entry.title: Process Journal Entries to SAP B1 via Service Layer
entry.content:
We would like to ask for guidance regarding the most efficient method to post approximately 100,000 Journal Entry records into SAP Business One.

We are evaluating different approaches (Worker Service , Read from SQL , Build JSON AND Post Service Layer)

entry.title: Bank statement parse error in SAP B1
entry.content:
Hi dear community members,

We are trying to parse the bank statement in txt format into SAP Business One. We created a bfp file using Electronic File Manager: Format Definition add-on. But when trying to add the statement in SAP it produces an error and does not add it. The error does not contain any information what caused this problem. Is there any way to see what exactly is breaking? Maybe there is a log file or additional information can be enabled in SAP.

@ladislav_meszaros @HuanYang

entry.content:

Kind regards,

entry.title: How to check hana database is corrupt
entry.content: Please let me know the process to identify whether the HANA database is corrupt, or if there are any specific error messages that indicate a database corruption issue.

entry.title: SAP B1 v10 SP2511 Installation Error on B1ServerToolsAuthentication
entry.content:
I got a new machine and was installing SAP B1 v10 SP1125 for a standalone instance.  I got through the new computer permissions errors quickly and got stuck on a failure of the server tools.   Specifically Authentication service (B1ServerToolsAuthentication): FAIL.  This was after creating my own certificate using openSSL, since the install was failing trying to create the installer created self signed certificate.  From the log I was able to find 

 Action result: FAIL (ScriptAction<\SetupFilesAuthentication_action.ps1><post-install>)

[2025-11-30][com.sap.businessone.installer.InstallerThread.setRollbackPurpose]

[17:47:29][ INFO] Setting rollback purpose for B1ServerToolsAuthentication

[17:47:29][ INFO] Rollback system feature:

[17:47:29][ INFO] 1) B1ServerTools-Service-LicenseServer

This occurred after Tomcate Configuration Update:

[17:42:00][ INFO] ScriptAction<\SetupFilesAuthentication_action.ps1><post-install>

[17:42:00][ FINE] Feature [B1ServerToolsAuthentication] status={SUCCESS}

[2025-11-30][com.sap.businessone.installer.actions.ScriptAction.onExecute]

[17:42:00][ INFO] Script action [\SetupFilesAuthentication_action.ps1] started

[2025-11-30][com.sap.businessone.installer.machine.access.shell]

[17:42:00][ FINEST] Running command [Windows Script [\SetupFilesAuthentication_action.ps1]]

[17:42:00][ FINEST] Updating enviroment variables:

It appears to be something to do with the configuration of the certificate and security when working with the certificate.   Any ideas would be appreciated.

entry.title: SAP Business One authorization(s) needed to "Select Stock" in Delivery under Sales - A/R
entry.content:

For the life of me I can't figure out what I'm missing. I appreciate any help that you can give me.

Thanks,
Stacey

entry.title: Client certificate for ComSignTrust
entry.content:
I want to integrate digital signature on the report of AR invoice. PDF file of AR invoice is generated first and then digital sign will be printed at the bottom. I am using ComSignTrust for this application. Dll is not provided by ComSignTrust. I am using WSDL . When I am adding the Service reference of https://online-dev.comsigntrust.com/signature/signature.svc?wsdl , I am getting error as,

There was an error downloading 'https://online-dev.comsigntrust.com/signature/signature.svc?wsdl/_vti_bin/ListData.svc/$metadata'.
The request was aborted: Could not create SSL/TLS secure channel.
Metadata contains a reference that cannot be resolved: 'https://online-dev.comsigntrust.com/signature/signature.svc?wsdl'.
Could not establish secure channel for SSL/TLS with authority 'online-dev.comsigntrust.com'.
The request was aborted: Could not create SSL/TLS secure channel.
If the service is defined in the current solution, try building the solution and adding the service reference again.

So I changed the method. I used SOAP for generating the signature.  There I got error as,

The request was aborted.Could not create SSL/TLS secure channel.

Both the methods gave me the same error. I have not installed the client certificate on the PC. Is it needed ? Will it fix the problem if client certificate is installed ?

entry.title: Security Update for Apache Tomcat of B1if (SAP Business One)
entry.content:
Hello,

We have installed SAP Business One for Hana FP2405 with B1if but our security team have detected security issues with the version of Apache Tomcat used by B1if in that version. The problem is that even your last version  (at the time I'm writing this question) of SAP Business One for Hana (PL 2511) is shipped with Apache Tomcat 10.1.44 which already have security issues (https://www.cvedetails.com/version/1991106/Apache-Tomcat-10.1.44.html) .
So we want to know if it's possible to apply only security update to Apache Tomcat and also if you have a procedure for that because as it's going there alwayse be a gap between the time a new Apache Tomcat security update is released and the time you release a security patch so every systems are vulnerable in this period. 
If it's not possible what solution do you recommend?

Thank you
Michael

entry.title: Estou com esse problema ao rodar algumas rotas no assistente de MRP
entry.content:
Ao selecionar alguns cenários, estou com o seguinte mensagem :   Ondens de produção e solicitações de transferência de estoque não foram recomendados para 3 itens superios devido a componentes necessários de 14 depósitos, cuja demanda não foi incluída nesta execução MRP ( Por exemplo, item 01.06.02.030.00 no deposito 01 )

Verifiquei o item mencionado e  o mesmo está recomendado para ser  planejado por MRP . 

Alguém já passou por algo parecido?

entry.content:

It doesnt become -1 and 2 for Instalment Terms and Blank Agreement.

Kedalene Chong

entry.title: Branch Name UDF Not Copied to Journal Entry through Reference Field Link
entry.content:
Dear Team,

I would like to bring to your attention an issue we are experiencing in SAP Business One.

The Branch Name UDF field, which has been configured through Reference Field Link Setup, is not being copied into the corresponding Journal Entry. This behavior occurs both when we add a manual goods issue and when issuing to production.

We are using SAP Business One 10 latest version Patch.

Please guide on the same. 

Regards,

SAP Business One

entry.title: Delivery Note/Package Query
entry.content:
Hi,
I am trying to generate a query comparing the quantity on a delivery note line items to the quantity on the delivery note packages.  I only need the lines that are different in the results.

I have the query:
SELECT T0."DocNum", T1."ItemCode", SUM(T1."Quantity") AS "DelQty", T2."ItemCode", SUM(T2."Quantity") AS "PackQty" FROM ODLN T0 INNER JOIN DLN1 T1 ON T0."DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry" LEFT JOIN DLN8 T2 ON T1."DocEntry" = T2."DocEntry" AND T1."ItemCode" = T2."ItemCode" WHERE T0."DocNum" ='15079'
GROUP BY T0."DocNum", T1."ItemCode", T2."ItemCode"

But when I try for the HAVING clause - Get No Results I tried a couple

a) HAVING SUM(T1."Quantity") > SUM(T2."Quantity") OR SUM(T1."Quantity") < SUM(T2."Quantity")
b) HAVING SUM(T1."Quantity") <> SUM(T2."Quantity") 

If I say HAVING SUM(T1."Quantity") = SUM(T2."Quantity") - I get the lines that the quantities match

Any help would be greatly appreciated

entry.title: Inquiry about DI API for Cash Flow Report in SAP Business One
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support Team,
I am seeking technical guidance regarding the Cash Flow Report in SAP Business One (accessible via: Reports → Financial → Financial → Cash Flow).
In the Cash Flow - Selection Criteria interface, there are numerous complex filtering options, such as:
  • Date range (From/To)
  • Time Interval options (Daily,Weekly,Monthly,Quarterly,Semi-annually, etc.)
  • Branch (filtering by GL accounts, business partners, etc.)
  • Include Projected Postings
  • Branch
My Question:
Does SAP Business One provide a DI API (Data Interface API) interface to programmatically access and generate the Cash Flow Report with these selection criteria? If yes, could you please provide:
  1. The relevant DI API object(s) and methods
  1. Sample code (preferably in C#) demonstrating how to set the selection criteria corresponding to the UI options
  1. Any documentation or SDK references specifically for the Cash Flow Report DI API
I have reviewed the standard DI API documentation but would appreciate specific guidance on mapping the UI selection criteria to DI API properties/methods.
Thank you for your support.
Best regards,
serena

entry.title: Crystal reports is asking for the database login credentials
entry.content:
Good morning,

I made a B1 upgrade to 2508, before the upgrade I didn't have any problem with my customized crystal reports (CR) neither with the system CR. After the upgrade, in the B1 server I installed a client and there's no problem with CR prints but in the B1 client that the users run, it's asking for database login every time. In my customized CR and because it was urgent, I was going into CR design, saving the credentials, and importing the layout to B1, and then it works in the B1 clients.

In the screen shot below, it's the ageing system report, and that's what the user gets. The database is gray out therefore it's impossible to type the credentials.

Please help.

Best regards,

Augusto
